Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-8088 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.12.3-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-8088 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.12.3-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.12.3-4, affected by CVE-2024-8088
